page.title: 03BIDEFORD AS A TOWN
page.content: {BIDEFORD IS NOT A BIG TOWN.} IT HAS NO LARGE STORES LIKE MARKS & SPENCERS OR DEBENHAMS OR A LOT MORE{DEPARTMENT {STORES}THAT WE COULD MENTION. BIDEFORD HAS A LOVELY{BRIDGE,}ALL THE ARCHES ARE DIFFERENT SIZES. AT THE MOMENT A NEW BRIDGE IS BEING BUILT NEAR THE SHIPYARD. IT SHOULD BE FINISHED BY 1987. BIDEFORD GETS A LOT OF{TOURISTS IN THE SUMMER. YOU GET QUEUES UP AND DOWN MOSTLY TO WESTWARD HO! GOING TO THE BEACH. BIDEFORD HAS A LITTLE HARBOUR WHERE A LOT OF SHIPS COME AND UNLOAD DIFFERENT{CARGOES.}THERE IS NOT A LOT OF{ENTERTAINMENT}IN BIDEFORD NEITHER DAY OR NIGHT. WE HAVE AN {AMUSEMENT ARCADE}CALLED ROOFTOPS. WE HAVE NOT EVEN GOT A CINEMA NOW BECAUSE NOT A LOT OF PEOPLE WENT THERE. BIDEFORD HAS{NOT EVEN GOT A SWIMMING {POOL.
